Table of Contents

NAME

sqencode - encoding using scalar quantization

SYNOPSIS

sqencode datfile quantizer channel

DESCRIPTION

sqencode encodes datfile (DAT format) using scalar quantization (SQ). sqencode uses input quantizer (SQ format) as the SQ codebook and outputs a channel of SQ indices to channel (CHN format). In general, datfile consists of vectors, and the scalar quantizer is applied separately to each vector component.

SEE ALSO

sqdecode(1) , squniform(1) , sqlloyd(1) , QccPackSQ(3) , QccPack(3)

AUTHOR
